Text: Future mother!?
I know your love \n for her is true...

I know you want to see 
 me, but you can't keep 
 this a secret. You'll 
 worry your family.
I'm looking forward to \n reading whatever your \n mighty pen has to write!
This boy from Havina \n fell in love with a girl \n from Elgona?
And they've been meeting \n in secret ever since?
Maybe I won't make the \n front page, but there's \n still a story in this!
Sorry you didn't get \n the front page story \n you were after.

I guess I can see 
 how you thought I 
 was some kind of 
 kidnapper.

People should be allowed 
 to choose who they love, 
 and those kids are hope 
 for that.
Mother, can I \n still come here?
A love that crosses \n class boundaries.
Let me get this \n straight...

When I noticed him 
 sneaking down here 
 before, I raced him 
 back to Havina.

This time I didn't 
 notice he slipped 
 aboard my boat until 
 getting back here.
Nothing stands in the \n way of true love.
Don't you dare talk bad \n about my future mother.
So I want to use this as \n a chance to help open \n other eyes.
I may be poor, but I'm \n not that desperate!

But if you really want 
 to keep seeing her, 
 you'll have to convince 
 them.

This whole story made 
 me realize how blind 
 I've been to our 
 social problems.
I assume you're worried \n your parents will oppose \n your coming here?
I took the boy back to \n his parents in Havina.

Who else would I be 
 talking about? So tell 
 me, are you planning to 
 hold him for ransom?
I'm sorry for the \n misunderstanding.
Wait, are you talking \n about this boy here?
I'll do whatever it \n takes!
I just wish the children \n didn't have to grow up \n in the world we do.
Kidnapper!?
What do I want!? What do \n you want, kidnapper!?
What do you want!?
Eh, we're used to being \n misunderstood down here.
But I can't have you \n coming here without your \n parents' permission.
Ask Witnesses for Information \n on the Missing Boy
Hey, you're that \n reporter! What are you \n doing here?

I'm following up on a 
 rumor that one of the 
 boys from Havina got 
 kidnapped.
Kidnapped!? That's \n a big deal!

Absolutely, and if I 
 get the scoop, this 
 article is going to be 
 big too.

More important is 
 finding that poor 
 boy and getting him 
 back to his parents.

That's the spirit! I'm 
 trying to find out if 
 anyone had something 
 against the parents.
Could you take this \n picture of the boy and \n ask around?
If something comes up, \n give me a call.
Alright, I'll ask around \n here first.
I should ask around to see if anyone knows something.
Townsperson: \n The pier's over that way.
Head to the Pier
There's the pier.
I should ask him if he knows anything.
Where?
That's the woman!
Take a Picture of the Woman
Suspect: \n Who are you, and why are you getting in my way?
Suspect: \n How dare you take a picture of me!?
Shoot, she saw me.
This should work.
Hmm... I'm a little too far away.
What am I doing with my camera!?
I need a picture from the front.
Sh-She's gone!
He might know where she went.
I need to catch her!
Head Down to the \n Water Tanks
I can't believe I let my eyes off of her...
That boy could be in trouble, I have to find her.
Could she really have kidnapped a kid?
If she did kidnap that boy, I'm going to get him back!
That's her airboat!
I need to gather more information.
I need to ask around for more information.
I need to ask that person about the woman.
I need to get a picture of that woman.
Huh?
Don't know anything? Okay, I'll keep asking.
I need to get to the pier.
I need to follow that woman.
Oh, that's that little \n philosopher.
He was always pondering \n things like the meaning \n of love and whatnot.
Guess he's a \n pretty deep kid.
He comes from a very \n renowned family here in \n Lei Havina.

It doesn't sound like 
 she knows where he is... 
 Better keep asking 
 around here.
Oh, that young lad!
I've seen him over by \n the pier talking to an \n Elgona woman.
At least, that's what I \n assumed given her \n appearance.
Maybe they're \n over there now.
The pier is the only \n place the Elgona sort \n are allowed.
Okay, I'll go see if \n he's there.
*Beep* *Beep*
Find anything?
I heard he was seen \n talking to a woman from \n Elgona by the pier.
I'm going over there now \n to see if he's still \n there.
An Elgona woman? She \n must be after a ransom!
Aren't you jumping the \n gun a little bit there?
You're right. Sounds \n like it's worth \n checking the pier.
If you do spot that \n woman there, \n grab her picture.
The boy and that Elgona \n woman? Hmm...

Well, I have to admit I 
 thought it was a little 
 suspicious they seemed 
 to know each other.
After all, there's no \n way she's a member \n of the family...
Ah, there she is now!
That's her, I better \n grab a picture!
I should keep my \n distance so I don't \n startle her.
*Beep* *Beep*
I found the woman, and \n I'm pursuing her now.
Did you get the picture?
Yep! A perfect shot.
Great! Stay on \n her tail then.
We might be scratching \n the surface of a huge \n crime syndicate!
A syndicate!?
My last article was \n covered up...
But this time the world \n will see the truth! Just \n don't lose her.
I'm a Gravity Shifter, I \n can certainly handle \n following a little boat.
Meow!
Yeah, no problem - \n right, Dusty?
Okay, I'm counting on \n you to help us get on \n the front page!
Leave it to me!
Meow!!!
What, Dusty!?
Shoot, I lost her.
Wait. That guy was just \n talking to her...
I should ask him.
Excuse me, do you know \n where that woman who \n was just here is going?

The new hire? She 
 finished her work, so I 
 imagine she's heading 
 home.
I think she mentioned \n she lives down in Elgona \n over by the water tanks.
The water tanks \n in Elgona, got it!
Phew, found her!
This time I \n won't lose her.
Hmm, that person might \n be helping her with the \n kidnapping.
I better be careful not \n to get spotted.
What are you doing!?
Shoot, she saw me.

Is this their criminal 
 lair? All of those 
 people must be with 
 her on this.
I better give an update \n to that reporter.
*Beep* *Beep*
Did you follow that \n woman to the criminal \n organization's hideout?

Well, yes and no. It's 
 less of a criminal 
 organization and more 
 of a family.
I don't get it.
I'll head over there \n now, just make sure to \n grab a few pictures.
Pictures... Got it.

Guess I should get a 
 shot of the two of them 
 together and one of the 
 building.
She's on the move!
Follow the Woman
I need to stay out of sight...
Lost her!
I have to be careful to stay out of sight.
I have to be careful not to lose her.
Is that person involved in the kidnapping too?
Wait, who's that little girl?
Take Pictures for Evidence
Suspect: \n Who are you, and why are you getting in my way?
Suspect: \n How dare you take a picture of me!?
Shoot, she saw me.
I should get a picture of them together.
Great, got one picture!
Hmm, this is a little too far away.
I need both of them in the shot.
I should grab a picture of that building too.
Perfect!
I need to get the woman's house in the picture.
Hmm, it's a little off-kilter.
I should get a little more distance.
I need to get a picture from the front.
W-Wait, that's the kid!
He doesn't seem very "kidnapped."
Reporter: \n You've been busted, kidnapper!
I need to take a picture.
Who's she talking to?
I should get back to what I was doing.
